comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is another aerial photo of Republic Airport (FRG / KFRG) in Farmingdale, Long Island. The point of view is from the south looking north. The hangar and tower on the right side of the frame is the same as the one in the photo below. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/6432985865/in/photostream/] See also this aerial photograph of Republic Airport and Republic Aviation taken in the 1950s. sites.google.com/site/lirepublicairporths/new22 Here's a contemporary photo of the hangar described above: Photo credit: metro1wayne's Photostream on Flickr [http://www.flickr.com/photos/15162574@N00/3454050585/]
